name: Suomen Kylmäliikkeiden Liitto ry - Finnish Refrigeration Enterprices Association
membership:
SKLL-FREA is a member of AREA (Air
Conditioning and Refrigeration European Association)
memberOrga:
Members of SKLL-FREA is presented in webpage
http://www.kylmaextra.fi/urakoitsijat, all of them are private enterprises.
goal:
SKLL - FREA is representing refrigeration, air conditioning and heat pump contractors (80 % of members), manufacturers (10 %) and
wholesalers/importers (10 %) in Finland. Total number of member companies is 200 and their workforce in refrigeration, AC and HP
departments is close to 3.000.
SKLL - FREA's general mission statement is to “support and initiate activities to promote the industry and its high standards of quality,
in order to serve end users interest in a safe, uninterrupted and energy-efficient usage of refrigeration, air conditioning and heat pump
equipment, and to create and maintain a favourable business climate for Finnish refrigeration, air conditioning and heat pump
companies in terms of quality, safety, employment, fair competition and profitability”
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
